publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2643 Mr Frank McAveety: The Curators ad Litem and Reporting Officers (Panels) (Scotland) Regulations-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Curators ad Litem and Reporting Officers (Panels) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/477). Supported by: Jackie Baillie*

S1M-2643 Mr Frank McAveety: The Curators ad Litem and Reporting Officers (Panels) (Scotland) Regulations-That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Curators ad Litem and Reporting Officers (Panels) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 (SSI 2001/477). Supported by: Jackie Baillie
